content: J#25380 defines "disabledDisplay" on Questionnaire, as a sibling to enableWhen, and with options "hidden" and "protected". A couple of questions:
1) Will disabledDisplay be added before or after Questionnaire becomes normative?
2) Will the default behavior (hidden or protected) be specified, and if so, what will it be?

1. It'll be added in R5. We'll presumably mark it as 'STU', as that element hasn't been well-exercised. (We'll actually need to walk through the Questionnaire and QR response resources and figure out which elements should be flagged as 'STU-only'
  2. Default could be hidden, protected or client choice. My leaning is the last - other thoughts?
Re #2, I think there might already be differing implementations on this point. Perhaps just leave it as client choice.
